Mixing Method.1: Pour celery salt on a small plate
Mixing Method.2: Rub juicy side of lemon or lime wedge along the lip of a glass
Mixing Method.3: Roll the outer edge of the glass in the celery salt until fully coated
Mixing Method.4: Fill with ice and set aside
Mixing Method.5: Squeeze lemon and lime wedge into shaker and drop them in
Mixing Method.6: Add remaining ingredients and fill with ice
Mixing Method.7: Shake gently and strain into the prepared glass

Mixing Method.1: Put the ice, frozen pineapple, juice, coconut cream, and the white and dark rums into a blender
Mixing Method.3: Pour the drink into 2 glasses and garnish the rim with pineapple slices and a little umbrella

Cooking method.2: Heat the oil in a frying pan and gently fry the onions, carrot and garlic
Cooking method.3: Add curry powder and flour to the pan and cook for 1 minute stirring all the time
Cooking method.4: Add mushrooms and pepper to the frying pan and cook for 2 to 3 minutes
Cooking method.5: Stir in the stock and cooked chicken pieces
Cooking method.6: Add the defrosted peas, reduce heat and cook slowly for 10 minutes without stirring

Ingredients.Chicken stock cube: 1 pc, dissolved in 275 ml of hot water
